bio.name: Abhishek Dukare
bio.tagline: Forging the synthesis between human intent and machine intelligence.
bio.about: I operate at the intersection of research and production. My expertise lies in deconstructing complex LLM architectures and rebuilding them into scalable, user-centric applications. I don't just train models; I build the infrastructure that gives them life.

description: Architected a multi-modal RAG search engine handling 50k+ daily queries.
Reduced LLM inference costs by 40% through quantization and caching strategies.
Led the migration of legacy NLP systems to transformer-based architectures.
Deployed computer vision models for real-time defect detection on edge devices.
Built automated data pipelines processing 2TB+ of sensor data daily.
Optimized model serving latency from 500ms to 80ms using ONNX.

education.description: Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science. Graduated with First Class Distinction.

projects.title: Neural Nexus
projects.description: An autonomous agent framework capable of planning and executing complex multi-step tasks using recursive reasoning.

projects.title: VisionGuard Edge
projects.description: Real-time security analytics platform running on edge hardware with privacy-preserving processing.

projects.title: DocuMind Enterprise
projects.description: Enterprise-grade knowledge base chat system with citation and hallucination checking mechanisms.
